faqs.question: What is the typical size range for a 2BHK Flat in Sector 57 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The size of a 2BHK flat in Sector 57 can vary significantly depending on whether you opt for a builder floor unit or a group housing society apartment. Generally builder floor 2BHK units range from 800 square feet to 1200 square feet of super area. Society apartments tend to fall in the range of 950 square feet to 1350 square feet. When evaluating size always ask for the specific carpet area metric as this indicates the actual usable space within the walls of your unit rather than the super area which includes common access spaces.

faqs.question: Are 2BHK builder floors or society flats a better investment choice in this sector
faqs.answer: Both options have distinct advantages in Sector 57. Builder floors often offer larger rooms greater flexibility in terms of internal customization and immediate possession without the long-term maintenance fees associated with large societies. Society flats however provide extensive integrated amenities like clubs pools and professional security systems. The best choice ultimately depends entirely on your budget desired amenities and preferred style of community living.
